valid_declarations_list.tweet_text:
I declare that I will join Claude's team in @TrenchMarking 's challenge.

If Claude wins the Solana Trenching Benchmark, I'll be eligible for SOL rewards from creator fees.

If Claude wins the Solana Trenching Benchmark, I'll be eligible for SOL rewards from creator fees.
